name: RPG Merchant
description: Ever wondered what life is like for a merchant in a role-playing game? Wonder no more! Experience life behind the counter in RPG Merchant, a VR game that lets you serve customers and face unexpected challenges with the help of a mysterious wizard.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: VR headset required. Oculus Touch controllers required if using the Rift headset
